ðŸ“– Summary: LibreLingo is a community-owned language learning platform that offers interactive exercises and spaced repetition to help users learn new languages. It features progress tracking and cross-device synchronization, making it accessible on various devices. The platform emphasizes free and open-source courses, promoting community contribution and ownership.
